definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: An electrical tachometer receives voltage pulses from the ignition system, usually the coil.
sentences.chinese: 電器轉速錶從點火系統中接受電壓脈衝，通常是線圈。

sentences.english: A variety of digital tachometers are manufactured.
sentences.chinese: Dynalco公司提供各種數字轉速錶。

sentences.english: At last, testing results on static and kinetic characteristic of the Electronic Percent Turnmeter are presented.
sentences.chinese: 最後給出了電子百分比轉速錶的靜態和動態測試結果。

sentences.english: We also provide complete tachometers and over speed protection systems.
sentences.chinese: 另外還有功能齊全的轉速錶超速保護等速度處理系統。

sentences.english: The grating and the photoelectric technology were employed to design the high-precision intelligent revolution meter.
sentences.chinese: 利用光柵和光電技術設計高精度智能型轉速錶。

sentences.english: These products enable speed control of DC motors with or without tachometers.
sentences.chinese: 這些產品使無轉速錶或速度控制的直流電動機。
